uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.vector

Class VectorOfDrawables

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.Vector<Drawable>
          • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.vector.VectorOfDrawables
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Drawable>, Collection<Drawable>, List<Drawable>, RandomAccess

    public class VectorOfDrawables
extends Vector<Drawable>
    Contains all Drawable type objects (ClassDiag & RelationshipDiag) in a Vector, to allow universal use by the system as required.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11), Sam Jackson (slj11), Craig Heptinstall (crh13)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
